results.content: Very good course!  This is a new subject for me, yet I was able to follow the course okay and everything worked fine. My recommendation, please update the materials that are not up-to-date any more such as installation of npm (the course used the old module that is no longer working) and js click function (the course uses the click function which has already been deprecated, it is now replaced with on("click",fn). For beginner like me, I struggled quite a bit to get the "npm start" to work, as first time I tried following carefully the instructions provided in the course, the system generate list of error messages due to items that are no longer supported. After searching on the web, I found the solution.
results.content_html: Very good course! This is a new subject for me, yet I was able to follow the course okay and everything worked fine. My recommendation, please update the materials that are not up-to-date any more such as installation of npm (the course used the old module that is no longer working) and js click function (the course uses the click function which has already been deprecated, it is now replaced with on("click",fn). For beginner like me, I struggled quite a bit to get the "npm start" to work, as first time I tried following carefully the instructions provided in the course, the system generate list of error messages due to items that are no longer supported. After searching on the web, I found the solution.

response.content:
Hi Zeros,

The course is prepared using a windows machine. All the configurations should have the same effects on a Mac, but should be done using the Mac way.

Kind regards,
